column5: Just wondering if theres any good trout fishing in orangeville. Wanted to try to see if i could catch anything. Next year. Noticed a lot of small tribs and creeks west of it. Any fish to be caught?  Thanks.
agreed, some good trout water near by.   get a map and track some of the tribs back you be surprised what you find.
I think he means for the next year
The upper credit is a well known trout spot, but has special regs
yes i meant for next year. thanks for the responses
Or posts for that matter.. it says "next year"
Forks Of The Credit gets lots of residents stocked in there, usually has decent trouting but you won't be alone.
